Package com.bitsavior.game

Class Watch

java.lang.Object
com.bitsavior.game.Watch
public class Watch
extends java.lang.Object
a watch holds information and functionality for implementing timers e.g for controlling time sensitive behaviours and effect changes

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    long elapsedTime
    the elapsed time since the start of the watch in milliseconds
    private boolean isActive
    shows if the watch is active or not
    long startTime
    the current system time in milliseconds
    long timeLimit
    the desired time limit in milliseconds

    reset the current watch and set all values to zero
